summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4656 for the improvement of Bothell Way, from 15th Avenue Northeast to East 85th Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54085, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
